p: PQR could also prevent premature ovarian failure by regulating prostaglandin biosynthesis and ovulation ( Zhu et al., 2015), and promote penile erection by directly inducing dilation and relaxation of penile cavernous vessels ( Murphy and Lee, 2002). In addition, PQR has the effects of anti-radiation ( Liao et al., 2019), protecting liver and kidney ( Jiang et al., 2020), strengthening the function of spleen and stomach ( Gao et al., 1998; Long et al., 2019), anti-fatigue ( Chang et al., 2018),and so on. However, previous scholars have seldom studied these pharmacological effects of PQR, and future scholars can further study its pharmacodynamic components, action targets and mechanism, so as to enrich the clinical practice of PQR.
